title: Kobe Bryant, Lakers, Kyler Murray, and the NFL draft
itunes:title: Kobe Bryant, Lakers, Kyler Murray, and the NFL draft
description:
Colin gives his reasons why Kobe Bryant may become the Los Angeles Lakers new President, why Lakers HC Luke Walton may go to the Sacramento Kings, more on QB  Kyler Murray possibly going to the Arizona Cardinals, and more on the NFL draft. Guests include Sam Amick, Chris Broussard, Rob Parker, and Will Blackmon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
